member.name: T:Axiverse.Matrix3
member.summary: Represents a 3 by 3 matrix.

member.name: F:Axiverse.Matrix3.M11
member.summary: Gets or sets the component in the 1st row and 1st column.

member.name: F:Axiverse.Matrix3.M12
member.summary: Gets or sets the component in the 1st row and 2nd column.

member.name: F:Axiverse.Matrix3.M13
member.summary: Gets or sets the component in the 1st row and 3rd column.

member.name: F:Axiverse.Matrix3.M21
member.summary: Gets or sets the component in the 2nd row and 1st column.

member.name: F:Axiverse.Matrix3.M22
member.summary: Gets or sets the component in the 2nd row and 2nd column.

member.name: F:Axiverse.Matrix3.M23
member.summary: Gets or sets the component in the 2nd row and 3rd column.

member.name: F:Axiverse.Matrix3.M31
member.summary: Gets or sets the component in the 3rd row and 1st column.

member.name: F:Axiverse.Matrix3.M32
member.summary: Gets or sets the component in the 3rd row and 2nd column.

member.name: F:Axiverse.Matrix3.M33
member.summary: Gets or sets the component in the 3rd row and 3rd column.

member.name: M:Axiverse.Matrix3.Add(Axiverse.Matrix3)
member.summary: Adds another matrix to this matrix.

member.name: M:Axiverse.Matrix3.Subtract(Axiverse.Matrix3)
member.summary: Subtracts another matrix from this matrix.

member.summary: Multiplies this matrix with another matrix.

member.summary: Inverts the matrix.

member.summary: Transposes the matrix.

member.name: M:Axiverse.Matrix3.Inverse
member.summary: Computes the inverse of this matrix.

member.name: M:Axiverse.Matrix3.Transposition
member.summary: Computes a transposition of this matrix.

member.name: M:Axiverse.Matrix3.Determinant
member.summary: Computes the determinant of the matrix. The determinant is the factor at which the matrix expands or contracts space.

member.summary: The zero matrix.

member.summary: The identity matrix.

member.summary: The negative infinity matrix.

member.summary: The positive infinity matrix.

member.summary: Gets or sets the X component.

member.summary: Gets or sets the component at the given index.

member.summary: Returns this vector after normalizing. The length of the vector will be 1.

member.summary: Returns the dot product between this and the target vector.
member.param: A vector to calculate the dot product with

member.name: M:Axiverse.Vector2.Length
member.summary: Returns the length of the vector. For length comparisons, use LengthSquared for better performance.

member.name: M:Axiverse.Vector2.LengthSquared
member.summary: Returns the square of the length of the vector. Runs faster than computing the length.

member.name: M:Axiverse.Vector2.ManhattanLength
member.summary: Returns the manhatten length of the vector.

member.summary: Returns the distance between this and the specified vector.

member.summary: Returns the square of the distance between this and the specified vector.

member.summary: Determines whether this instance is zero.
member.returns: true if this instance is zero; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Returns this vector with each component set to the maximum value of that component in the given list of vectors.
member.param: The alpha component.

member.summary: Returns this vector with each component set to the minimum value of that component in the given list of vectors.
